name: Siltanen & Partners Advertising
description:
Hi. We're Siltanen & Partners Advertising. We don’t just do advertising:  We create ideas that Power Business.
Since we opened our doors in 1999, S&P has helped build and reinvent businesses of all shapes and sizes—from car companies to restaurant chains to computer companies—and virtually everything in between. Everything we do, driven by our expertise and passion is focused on "powering your business."
Siltanen & Partners is independently owned and operated by top creative thinkers, which allows us to run smarter, faster, and with more cost efficiency than traditional agencies. It also allows our principals to be “hands on” with every account in our office: the folks you meet will be the same folks partnering with you everyday.
We are a true, full-service agency from strategy to roll-out: we have media planning and buying department to service both national and local markets, a digital group with front to back mobile and desktop development and maintenance capabilities, and a broadcast production company with three state-of-the-art edit bays. And all may be tailored based on your needs without compromise.
